Text: Great gift ideas easy orderingIMAGE Dear MARK No need to fret about the giftgiving season ahead Our Web site is filled with great ideas for anyone on your list Well del iver your gifts and greetings in tiptop condition in time for the holidays If you visit our convenient Web site you can also take advantage of seas onal specials and exclusive varieties available in only limited quantitie s IMAGE Save on Simply Red our exclusive Tulip Collection with p repared bulbs in a basket shipped ready to start growing IMAGE African Mallow Standard Save Our talented greenhouse staff spend more than a year pinching and pruning our African Mallow standard s to perfection F or a limited time and only on the Web save on this longblooming ea sytogrow plant also known as Anisodontea x hypomandarum Plants are t o inches tall growing in in clay pots We also send the saucer The plants can spend next summer outdoors and will bloom mightily IMAGE Our Trailing Abutilon has bellshaped flowers of red and gold that lig ht up the sunny variegated foliage Abutilons also called Flowering Maple s are among the easiest houseplants in the world and bloom for an astonis hingly long season In fact theyll bloom months of the year if given regular watering and a bit of fertilizer occasionally We send complete car e instructions with every order We recently updated our site to make giftgiving easier and faster After you register as a member you can crea te an address book that will store your addresses for future use Click on gift message in your cart and you can add your personal greetings to eac h recipient Thank you for your interest in White Flower Farm If you choo se to order please reference Source Code when prompted during checko ut To review our privacy statement click here Copyright White Fl ower Farm Inc
